Reviews.Title: This is For a Specific Toshiba Camera
Reviews.Author: Anarchy
Reviews.Content: I bought a 1.3 MP high speed dome camera but the mounting bracket did not come with it.  Shame on the vendor.  I thought this mount would work but the holes do not match the camera's bracket.  It is solid and well made to hold a specific Toshiba security camera on a pole.

ProductInfo.Features:
Allows Toshiba dome housings to be mounted to an existing pole
Designed for use with Toshiba's JK-PHI and JK-PHO housings, and the JK-WM wall-mount bracket
Constructed of durable aluminum with a powder-coat finish
Includes a threaded bolt that inserts to make installation both quick and easy
Mounts to poles ranging from three- to 15-inches in diameter, bears up to 75 pounds
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba JK-PMA Pole Mount Adapter, for use with JK-PHI & JK-PHO Series Housings with JK-WM Wall Mount
